parameters.label: Allow Position
parameters.infoText: Whether to allow the camera's position to be manually controlled at all.

parameters.label: X
parameters.infoText: The horizontal position the camera's center should be in.

parameters.label: Y
parameters.infoText: The vertical position the camera's center should be in.

parameters.label: Relative To
parameters.infoText: What the camera should be positioned relative to, if anything.

parameters.label: Character's Camera
parameters.infoText: If checked, the camera will be positioned relative to the character's camera position. Otherwise, the camera will be positioned relative to the character's center.

parameters.label: Movement Type
parameters.infoText: What type of movement should be used to get the camera into position.

parameters.label: Time (Seconds)
parameters.infoText: If the movement type is "Tween", how long the tween will take.

parameters.label: Ease
parameters.infoText: The type of transition to use for the tween.

parameters.label: Trigger at Start
parameters.infoText: If checked, this event will trigger when the song first loads in instead of triggering where it's placed in the song.
